source.interface:
<implements name="BaseMultivariateOptimizer" />
* This interface represents an optimization algorithm for{@link MultivariateDifferentiableFunction scalar differentiable objective * functions}. * Optimization algorithms find the input point set that either {@link GoalTypemaximize or minimize} an objective function. MultivariateOptimizer MultivariateDifferentiableVectorOptimizer $Id: MultivariateDifferentiableOptimizer.java 1422230 2012-12-15 12:11:13Z erans $ As of 3.1 (to be removed in 4.0). 3.1
